name: One-Pan Garlic Butter Salmon 🥩
description: Experience the magic of a one-pan wonder with this scrumptious Garlic Butter Salmon recipe. Perfectly cooked salmon fillets are nestled in a heavenly garlic butter sauce, making for a quick and easy weeknight meal that's sure to impress!
instructions: In a bowl, mix butter, garlic, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Lay salmon fillets on a pan, and evenly distribute the marinade.
Place broccoli on both sides of the salmon, and drizzle on olive oil, salt, pepper, and parmesan.
